snippet.title: Latest celebrity news: Jodie Foster, Olivia Wilde and more
snippet.description: The latest happenings with Hollywood's A-listers.

snippet.title: Honoring beauty of Lupita Nyong'o is fine but what's next for her and other 'dark girls'
snippet.description: Expanding societal notions of how to measure beauty, talent and excellence will take more than a magazine cover.

snippet.title: Lupita Nyong'o named People's Most Beautiful Woman in the World
snippet.description: Her film debut in "12 Years a Slave" has earned her an Oscar for best supporting actress, a Screen Actors Guild Award and an NAACP Image Award for outstanding performance by a female actor in a supporting role - plus 2014 Golden Globe and BAFTA nominations. In addition to her work on screen, Nyong'o continues to impress with some of the season's best red-carpet looks.

snippet.title: 'Jungle Book' will likely be Lupita Nyong'o's next role
snippet.description: Lupita Nyong'o and Scarlett Johansson are in negotiations to join a live action/CGI version of the "Jungle Book."

snippet.title: Jodie Foster marries girlfriend Alexandra Hedison
snippet.description: Jodie Foster marries her girlfriend, photographer Alexandra Hedison, and is completely low-key about it.

snippet.title: Jodie Foster weds artist Alexandra Hedison
snippet.description: Jodie Foster is a married woman.

snippet.title: Indian film stars, Bollywood Oscars come to Fla.
snippet.description: The International Indian Film Academy is holding its annual awards ceremony in Tampa starting Wednesday.

snippet.title: Cat Deeley ditches fun side for bad girl role
snippet.description: U.K.-born and bred Cat Deeley has found a place in Hollywood, thanks to hosting the Fox dance competition show, "So You Think You Can Dance," which will launch its 11th season next month.

snippet.title: Lupita Nyong'o named People's Most Beautiful Woman in the World. Here's how stars typically land the honor.
snippet.description: "There was really no contest this year," People editorial director Jess Cagle said of the stunning 31-year-old Oscar winner.

snippet.title: Actress Garcelle Beauvais takes her twin boys to the Smithsonian
snippet.description: The Hollywood vet spends family time at the National Air and Space Museum
